definition: to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: Gordimer's fiction has been the subject of much commentary in South Africa over the years.
sentences.chinese: 戈迪默的小说已多年来在南非引起了很大评论的话题。

sentences.english: Rita repeated what Reardon recited when Reardon road the remarks.
sentences.chinese: 当利尔登阅读评论时，丽塔复述尔登背诵的东西。

sentences.english: Women get off on judging each other, especially their very own friends.
sentences.chinese: 女人天性心爱品论他人，特别是评论自己的好朋友。

sentences.english: Or you can have a form to collect visitors' comments about your site.
sentences.chinese: 或者可以创建表格收集访问者对网站的评论。

sentences.english: But you would never know that from reading the oped.
sentences.chinese: 但是仅凭阅读评论你永远不会知道此情况。

sentences.english: Mr. Nami, now detained by police, couldn't be reached for comment.
sentences.chinese: 波和二现在被警方拘留，无法获得他对本案的评论。

sentences.english: “Foreign critics would look at today’s data and argue for stronger yuan gains,” said Ben Simpfendorfer, a Hong Kong-based economist at Royal Bank of Scotland Plc.
sentences.chinese: 外国评论家看到今天的数据，又会说让人民币升值。

sentences.english: These commence and criticism are inevitable and not at all surprizing.
sentences.chinese: 这些评论和批评是必然的，并不令人感到奇怪。

sentences.english: Metrologic shop for computers and bar code scanners to read product reviews.
sentences.chinese: 店内码捷仪器硬件和条码扫描器读取商品评论。

sentences.english: Hmm. This must be a comment on the country's controversial birth.
sentences.chinese: 嗯嗯，这肯定是对这个国家的诞生做出的评论。

sentences.english: Some of the commenters are pessimist. Wait and watch.
sentences.chinese: 从评论来看，有些人是悲观主义者，等着瞧。

sentences.english: Stay tuned for more reviews once I start to give it a work out.
sentences.chinese: 敬请期待更多的评论当我开始给它一个工作了。

sentences.english: Let me end with a couple of other quick remarks.
sentences.chinese: 让我用一些其它的短评论来做结尾。

sentences.english: This created an interesting back-and-forth on the comments section of the article. For instance,  Mike Amundsen states
sentences.chinese: 这篇博文引起了一组有趣的来来回回的评论。

sentences.english: "Notes taken in Rong Study", comments on and studies of the …
sentences.chinese: 《容斋随笔》对《史记》人物的评论和研究。

definition: to leave a message/to leave one's comments/message
to like (an online post on Weibo, Facebook etc)
to transmit/to forward (mail, SMS, packets of data)/to pass on/to republish (an article from another publication)
way of looking at a thing/view/opinion/CL:個|个[ge4]
to give sb a thumbs-up (on social media)
to issue a document/document issued by an authority/outgoing messages/(Internet) to post an article online
private correspondence/personal letter/(computing) personal message (PM)/to message sb
to sticky (an Internet forum thread etc)
